<noinclude>

This is the "Add version history item" template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Add version history item
|Type= (value options: minor, major) 
|Description= (text) note description might have comma's wrapped around it which should be filterd, e.g. ",Example description,"
}}
</pre>

or

<pre>
{{subst:Add version history item
|Type=major
|Description=Example description
}}
</pre>

</noinclude><includeonly>{{safesubst:#af_foreach:{{safesubst:#invoke:VersionHistoryItems|get}} ||$data|{{Version history item 
|Version number={{safesubst:#if:{{safesubst:#af_get:{{{$data}}}|Current version number}} |{{safesubst:#switch:{{{Type|}}}
  |minor|#default={{safesubst:#explode:{{safesubst:#af_get:{{{$data}}}|Current version number}}|.|0}}.{{safesubst:#expr:{{safesubst:#explode:{{safesubst:#af_get:{{{$data}}}|Current version number}}|.|1}} + 1}}
  |major={{safesubst:#expr:{{safesubst:#explode:{{safesubst:#af_get:{{{$data}}}|Current version number}}|.|0}} + 1}}.0
  }}
  |1.0
  }}
|Version description={{safesubst:#invoke:VersionHistoryItems|processDescriptionInput|{{{Description|}}}}}
|Version date={{safesubst:#time: Y-n-d H:i:s |now}}
}}{{safesubst:#af_get:{{{$data}}}|Version history unparsed}} }}
}}</includeonly>
